item.title: Asking for Help on Social Media
item.description: Every now and then I will see someone asking for help with something on social media. As the helpful person I am, I decided to offer my help as I thought that in this particular case I might be able to solve the problem.

item.title: Why I switched from Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: In all honesty, the reason I switched from jekyll was I was told to. Well, that is a bit of a lie. I was simply told of an alternative by someone who is far more knowledgable than me in regards to website development and I decided to switch.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my new blog I’m not one for creative writing so you won’t find much of that here. I’m not convinced I will actually write much, but it is here just in case I feel like using it.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Cori Haws. I am multi-skilled with some knowledge of VisualBasic and Python, HTML and CSS design, Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, Aviation and Natural Sciences. I have aspirations of eventually becoming a Commercial Airline Pilot for a well respected airline and have had my mind set of achieving this dream of mine for many years.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: You can get in contact with me by clicking on the links in the side bar. I am also on a number of social media sites. Please refrain from friendship requests without prior contact.
